indicator.summary: RSI Divergence See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods in the RSI lookback window.
Number of span periods to the left of the evaluation period.
Number of span periods to the right of the evaluation period.
Number of periods in the lookback window.
Determines use of Close or High/Low wicks for points.
